FuncDef:
The peer-address command configures a peer IP address for an NQA PWE3 trace test instance.
The undo peer-address command restores the default configuration.
By default, no peer IP address is configured for an NQA PWE3 trace test instance.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a peer IP address for an NQA PWE3 trace test instance.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a peer IP address for an NQA PWE3 trace test instance, run the peer-address command.
